name: Connector
description:
Connector A game about, well, connecting. Have you ever struggled to connect USB devices because you didn't know what side was the correct one? Same here, that's why we decided to create Connector, where you'll not only have fun - and sometimes hate the game - but also learn how to properly connect USB devices.

The game is currently on alpha, no sounds, all arts are subject to change and some features are not yet available. Bug reports are really appreciated :)
